title: Unidentified Second PewDiePie Font. The font was made or used by a german YouTuber named: Kapuzenwurm. I'm guessing this font is either Obelix Pro or something else.
content:
YouTube Link: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nxQO53J2\_OQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114050/https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=nxQO53J2_OQ "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nxQO53J2\_OQ")  
FUNNY MONTAGE #3 by PewDiePie

Font: 

 Obelix Pro 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114050/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| [Screen Shot 2014-12-10 at 4.34.17 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114050/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-12-10%20at%204.34.17%20PM_0.png) | 97.13 KB |
author: mak97@comcast.net

comments.content: I confirm that **Obelix Pro** looks like a perfect match
I took a closer look and Obelix Pro is definitely a near perfect match, however, I can tell that the G in the attachment is more curled then in Obelix Pro.
